nodes.text: The Celebratus Archive was a library on the planet Obroa-skai that held complete records from over three hundred thousand different species. The creation of the library, in 16,782 BBY, secured the reputation of the planet as a bastion of research. The archive was included in the list of the Twenty Wonders of the Galaxy by the historian Vicendi in his 10,000 BBY publication Arturum Galactinum.
The library was raided by forces under Grand Admiral Thrawn in order to uncover the location of the planet Wayland.
